routes.query: SELECT A1_COD, A1_LOJA A1_NOME FROM %table:SA1% WHERE A1_COD+A1_LOJA = %codCliente%

SELECT * FROM %table:SC5% SC5 WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN %table:SC6% SC6 WITH (NOLOCK) ON ( SC6.C6_FILIAL = SC5.C5_FILIAL AND SC6.C6_NUM = SC5.C5_NUM AND SC6.D_E_L_E_T_ = ' ' ) WHERE SC5.C5_EMISSAO = %dtEmissao% AND SC5.D_E_L_E_T_ =  ' '
